summary: MANIFOLD EXHAUST BOLT SHEARED OFF AT 55,000 MILES.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR REPAIRS.   *AK   THERE WERE FIVE BROKEN BOLTS.  THE CONSUMER WOULD GET NAUSEATED DUE THE EXHAUST FUMES.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE THEY REMOVED ALL 12 BOLTS AND REPLACED THEM WITH NEW UNITS.  (COMMON PROBLEM)   *SCC  *JB
